actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide an additional 3-year period before States must begin repayment of outstanding advances to their unemployment compensation accounts.

summary.text: Authorizes an additional three-year period before States must begin repayment of outstanding advances to their unemployment compensation accounts.

titles.title: A bill to provide an additional 3-year period before States must begin repayment of outstanding advances to their unemployment compensation accounts.
